name: The Prophecy Lies!
description:
Description


Take the role of Darius, a Tiborean, who has to work with the most despicable creatures of all… the humans! Go to Panom’Arah, a part of the Human World and complete the difficult mission of finding and retrieving the Anomaly, a rare and dangerous form of magic.

Defeat hordes of enemies, fight bosses, explore dungeons, forests and ruins, solve mysteries, help people and find epic and even legendary weapons, armors and other loot! Purchase your own village, where people will flock after you complete various parts of the adventure and recruit various characters!

Will you manage to unravel the history of the human world part, Panom’Arah? Will you find the secret rooms and various loot scattered throughout the world? Fight, explore, read the lore and you will be rewarded!

Features

  • True Fullscreen mode from the Options
    Choose Window Skins and Fonts from the Options
    Choose your difficulty option at the start of the game
    Easy to learn combat system
    Quick Combat! (press the action button while in battle)
    Aesthetically pleasing areas with lots of treasure and loot
    10 secret rooms, various hidden quests and loot
    Legendary Weapons and Epic Armors
    Crazy, mysterious and fun characters to interact with
    17 trackable quests (via the Quest Log)
    Save your progress anywhere you want!
    Visible, non-respawning enemy encounters
    Mini-bosses to challenge your strategy and wit
    Lorebook that contains vital information about this adventure
    Over 20 unique music tracks
    Rich gameplay time of 8-12 hours depending on your exploration prowess!
